YouteTube.description1: I built a YouTube clone using React, TypeScript, and Vite. For handling dates and time formatting, I integrated Moment.js. To manage routing within the application, I utilized React Router. The project is styled using Tailwind CSS, which allowed for a responsive and modern design. This project served as a great opportunity for me to enhance my skills in front-end development and work with popular libraries and frameworks.

Toolbox.description1: I built this toolbox with Next.js, and I'm continuously improving it. My goal is to gather different useful features and keep expanding it with new tools over time. This project also serves as a playground for me to explore modern web technologies and strengthen my front-end development skills.

Francorchamps.description1: During my free time, I developed a website for the Rotary Club in my city. The site allows users to register for an event that has been taking place every year since 2024. It is built with Next.js for the frontend, Node.js for the backend and Prisma as ORM.
Francorchamps.description2: I used SASS extensively for the design and Tailwind CSS for responsiveness.
Francorchamps.description3: I use the Stripe API for payments and Resend for confirmation emails.
Francorchamps.description4: The form was created with react-hook-form and field validation with Zod.

Aviron.description: As a final project at BeCode, I developed the redesign of the rowing club's website at ULi√®ge with three other colleagues. The site allows admins to manage members and display the latest events and photos. Our team consisted of two frontend developers (including me) and two backend developers. It is built with NextJs for the frontend and Laravel for the backend.

Introduction.description: Having recently completed the Junior Developer training at BeCode and complemented it with an enriching internship at EVS Broadcast, I am looking for an opportunity to leverage my skills in a professional environment. I am punctual, dedicated, comfortable in collaborative environments, and eager to contribute to a team while continuing to develop my skills.
